TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
This GIF was taken when I found that retracting landing gear was a good idea.

I now have a way to execute Kerbals for fun! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

![6JnFR7V.gif](http://i.imgur.com/6JnFR7V.gif)

> 
> this is make me lol ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
> [http://i.imgur.com/jQDS84d.png](http://i.imgur.com/jQDS84d.png)

That is... beautiful. I have no words.

> 
> It's not mine, but ...

*plane crashes, pilot crawls out*

Don't worry guys, I'm ok!

*ground crew stares in horror*

What?

Low attitude correction burns is something else on gilly. 

[![lo7u8cZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/lo7u8cZ.jpg)](http://imgur.com/lo7u8cZ)

> 
> this is make me lol ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
> [http://i.imgur.com/jQDS84d.png](http://i.imgur.com/jQDS84d.png)

^that is what I call madness. tkw +rep.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-04T13:15:54Z" title="06/04/2015 01:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 4, 2015</time> by drewscriver**

![Screen%20Shot%202014-04-17%20at%207.04.52%20PM.png](http://jscript.ca/ksp-images/23-5/Jool%20Station/Screen%20Shot%202014-04-17%20at%207.04.52%20PM.png)

All that way, just to do that!

The indomitable optimism of Dilman Kerman. 

![QMsQ8lQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QMsQ8lQ.jpg)

![Fy0OWY7.png](http://i.imgur.com/Fy0OWY7.png)

I attempted to launch Luke Kerman into orbit by first jumping off a rover which had launched itself off a crater lip. He came soooo close... but as soon as he ran out of gas, his expression changed to this and I knew. Didn't even need to look at the map to know he wasn't going to make it. 

He had this sad look of resignation all the way down and I couldn't stop laughing at it.

Just stumbled on this one today while EVAing past the station's cupola, and had to take a picture

![2015-06-04_00002_zps0nhvjqbx.jpg~original](http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g194/ACESHIGH1/2015-06-04_00002_zps0nhvjqbx.jpg~original)

"Hey Jeb, can I come back in now? I'm sorry I ate all the snacks."
![BKk1xSb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BKk1xSb.jpg)

Shared this a few times, still makes me chuckle every time:

![screenshot278.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/screenshot278.png)
